thread.title: Steve Bannon makes rare public appearance to mock media | Daily Mail Online
thread.title_full: Steve Bannon makes rare public appearance to mock media | Daily Mail Online

author: David Martosko
title: Steve Bannon makes rare public appearance to mock media | Daily Mail Online
text: show ad The media are always wrong! Trump's controversial strategist Steve Bannon makes rare public appearance to mock 'opposition party' reporters and say war with media will 'get worse' Bannon sat alongside Reince Priebus, the White House chief of staff who is the party loyalist yin to to his right-wing yang Priebus said he hopes reporters catch up to Trump's agenda and soften their approach Bannon said it will get much worse as the president's economic policies begin to bear fruit He claimed major media outlets are owned by 'corporatist, globalist' companies 'that are adamantly opposed to an economic nationalist agenda like President Trump has 'If you think they're going to give you your country back without a fight,' he told a packed ballroom at CPAC, 'you are sadly mistaken.' Published: 20:05 GMT, 23 February 2017 | Updated: 22:12 GMT, 23 February 2017 203 shares
